mapper.update: UPDATE account SET tradePassword = #{tradePassword}, usableAmount = #{usableAmount}, freezedAmount = #{freezedAmount}, borrowLimitAmount = #{borrowLimitAmount}, version = version + 1, unReceiveInterest = #{unReceiveInterest}, unReceivePrincipal = #{unReceivePrincipal}, unReturnAmount = #{unReturnAmount}, remainBorrowLimit = #{remainBorrowLimit} WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
mapper.select: SELECT id, tradePassword, usableAmount, freezedAmount, borrowLimitAmount, version, unReceiveInterest, unReceivePrincipal, unReturnAmount, remainBorrowLimit FROM account WHERE id = #{id}
